Curriculum support

  • Curriculum topic loans of up to 20 books to support the teaching of curriculum topics throughout the term for primary schools, or up to 20 resources for KS3 on a termly basis.
  • Reading for pleasure loans: Loans of up to 35 fiction and non-fiction books/resources per class to support reading for pleasure. Large print and dual language available. One story sack per card available for EYFS.
  • Artefact service: up to 8 related/themed artefacts to support curriculum topics. Each box has a half-termly loan period. These are particularly useful for any multicultural work. See a list of all our artefact loans.
  • Books to meet special requests: Dual and foreign language books for EAL learners, and large print books.
  • Story sacks are available to borrow for EYFS.
  • Guided reader sets: 6 copies of a book to support reading development inside the classroom.
  • Group reading sets: 6 copies of a wider range of books available for loan. Allow you to share a book with a group of children in a reading group or book club.
  • Specialist Sixth Form service to support KS5:
    • Library class card for Sixth Form (KS5) to support work in the classroom.
    • Group reader sets of up to 6 books per set for KS5 courses.

Contact the LBRTS team for more info â†’

Privacy & cookies

By using our site you agree to our use of cookies. Find out what cookies we use, how they affect you and how you can control them: our cookie policy.
